arts.ttl: Crystal Palace agree signing – Record deal, travelling to London, beat Aston Villa
arts.sum: Crystal Palace have made a concrete approach to sign Toulouse FC’s Jaydee Canvot this summer. The Premier League club initially registered their interest earlier this month, and L’Equipe now report their negotiations have come to an end after reaching a positive conclusion.
